<h2>[Education]{.highlight}</h2>

🎓 Doctor of Philosophy, Molecular Genetics from La Trobe University, 2014

🎓 Bachelor of Agricultural Science, Rural Technology from the University of Queensland, 2010

<h2>[About Me]{.highlight}</h2>

I am a Genomic Breeding Scientist and Strategic Science Manager at Barenbrug where I lead the development and implementation of commercial genomic breeding and associated 'omic' technologies.

<h2>[Interest and Skills]{.highlight}</h2>

My expertise lies predominantly in the realm of 🧬 **Genomics**, with a specialised focus on **Genomic Selection** and **Genomic Breeding**, particularly in the context of plants 🌱. Proficient in **bioinformatics** 👨‍💻 {{< fa brands linux >}}, I am driven by a deep passion for the {{< fa brands r-project >}} programming language.

My skill set extends to crafting robust **cloud computing** ☁️ {{< fa brands aws >}} environments tailored for both research and production pipelines. I take pleasure in orchestrating these systems with the precision of the **Nextflow** 🔂 workflow manager, and proudly serve as a **Nextflow Ambassador**. Through my technical endeavours, I am dedicated to advancing genomic research and breeding practices for a sustainable future.
